group.headline: intox Gaming
group.summary:
Visit our forum @ www.intoxGaming.com

Welcome to intox Gaming! We are a multi-gaming community primarily focused on Counter-Strike: Source and Team Fortress 2.

You were invited into this group because you play CSS and/or TF2 and we think you will enjoy some of our servers!

Being invited into this group does not mean you are in the clan; wearing the 'intox' tag will result in a global ban from our servers. You must be invited into our PRIVATE group to become a full-fledged member. Become a well-known regular on our forum and servers and you just might receive an invite to the PRIVATE group. Good luck!

group.headline: VIP Reserved Slots...We're Makin' It Rain
group.summary:
Welcome to the fastest growing gaming community on the planet! We are not a clan, but a group of people who like to play ... and play to win. No Heroes is dedicated to building the most inclusive adult (18+) oriented gaming community on the planet. We do not allow any racism, bigotry, homophobic language, or sexual harassment of female players on our servers. Ever.

We have OVER TWENTY dedicated TF2 servers located all over the world on high-end, dual quad core dedicated servers. We also have Private Left 4 Dead 2 servers, Private L4D1 servers, and Ranked BFBC2 servers. More servers and more games in the near future, and this is only the beginning. Try the No Heroes experience for yourself... you won't be disappointed!

If you would like to make a donation to help maintain our community servers, contact steviestar or Loki Seto. Donations are greatly appreciated! CGE, SAE, and DRINKS are all hosted by Apoplexy Industries!

How to connect to a server using the IP address:
1. Go to your favourites tab in the server browser
2. Click add server
3. Copy/paste the IP address
4. Click add this server to your favourites

group.headline: Valve is killing the environment!
group.summary:
The TF2 idler allowed users to earn hats in an environmentally and ecologically responsible way, but with the new banning of the idler, the thousands of users that will leave their games running will emit billions of tons of CO2 into the atmosphere, bringing the imminent death of earth via global warming ever-closer.

We are banding together to show Valve that we do NOT support the systematic destruction of the earth's environment. Keep TF2 green and allow use of the idler!

group.headline: An international group that denounces the behaviour of Team Fortress 2 developers towards Idlers!
group.summary:
The purpose of that group is not to form an anti-Halo community, but to denounce the behaviour of Team Fortress 2 developers towards Idlers.

Indeed, the implementation of an unfair drop system in order to obtain hats and weapons is ruining the game. Most of the players do not play more than for this one.

But the worst is to treat the players of cheaters, while they had never been warned that what they made was not authorized.

Then, if as me you idled or that you continue to idle, join this group to express your anger towards Team Fortress 2 developers.

Everybody can join the group: Idlers, non-Idlers, Halo-wearers and more!

To contact us : data@proud-to-idle.com

/!\ Trolls, spam and insults will be deleted without notice! /!\

[Proud To Idle] Servers :
-----------------------------

No servers at the moment. :(

Many thanks to Â«tCoÂºÂ» miKe |mtcf, Kallard, [LNS] Yachi and y_3 for their old servers!

- DaTa -

Finally we won! Cheater's Lament for everybody!

group.headline: ROCK THAT NECKBEARD!
group.summary: The neckbeards of the world weild almost infinite power, yet they seldom use it except for when the cheetos run out.

group.headline: 19th April 1988 - 2nd October 2009
group.summary:
Michael Wurth, also known as Juicy J, died on 2nd Oct, 2009, at the age of 21 years old, from unknown causes.

He will be missed dearly by his fellow clan members, as well as by all of his family and friends.

We hope you rest in peace Juicy.
A LUELinks Militant Atheist Gaming Experience: 69.197.189.198:27015
